name: Firewall rule does not allow all traffic on port 80
query: {firewalls(where: {rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", sourceFromPort_LTE: 80, sourceToPort_GTE: 80, OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}]}}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash }}
